entries: Each enemy in the swarm's space takes {@damage 3d6} piercing damage (DC 24 basic Reflex save) plus exposure to marrow rot.
bot.name: Swarming Bites
Marrow Rot
bot.note:
Marrow rot affects only creatures with a skeletal

entries: {@damage 1d4+5} piercing Arcane Prepared Spells DC 23, attack +15; 3rd haste, hypnotic pattern, vampiric touch; 2nd dispel magic, invisibility, mirror image, telekinetic maneuver; 1st color spray, illusory disguise, illusory object, spider sting; Cantrips (3rd) daze, detect magic, electric arc, ghost sound, shield.
bot.name: S), Damage

entries: Hand illusionist deals {@dice 2d6} additional precision damage to {@condition flat-footed} creatures.
bot.name: Sneak Attack The Copper

mid.trigger: A creature targets the Copper Hand rogue with an attack, and the rogue can see the attacker
entries: The rogue dodges out of the way, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.
mid.name: Nimble Dodge

entries: The rogue applies one of their black adder venom poisons to their wielded weapon. If their next attack with that weapon before the end of their next turn hits and deals damage, the target is afflicted with the poison.
bot.name: Poison Weapon

entries: Hand rogue deals {@dice 1d6} additional precision damage to {@condition flat-footed} creatures.
bot.name: Sneak Attack The Copper

entries: +18 Str +4, Dex +6, Con +3, Int +4, Wis +3, Cha +6.
top.name: Stealth

entries: A dreadsong dancer is {@condition stunned|CRB|stunned 1} if they see or hear a creature critically succeed at a {@skill Performance} check or at a saving throw against their Dreadsong. The dreadsong dancer is {@condition quickened|CRB|quickened 1} for 1 round if they see or hear a creature critically fail at a {@skill Performance} check or a saving throw against their Dreadsong. They can use the extra action only to {@action Stride} or {@action Strike}.
mid.name: Performance Anxiety

mid.trigger: A creature plays an instrument while
entries: {@action Cast a Spell||Casting a Spell} or casts a composition spell within 20 feet of the dreadsong dancer; The dreadsong dancer {@action Stride||Strides} up to 20 feet and makes a songblade {@action Strike} against the triggering creature. If the {@action Strike} hits, the spell is disrupted.
mid.name: Jealous Musician

entries: The dreadsong dancer whirls their howling songblades and cloaks themself in illusion magic.
Each non-fiend creature in a 30-foot emanation from the dreadsong dancer must attempt a DC 29 Will save.

entries.Critical Success: No effect, and the creature is temporarily immune for 24 hours. The dreadsong dancer is affected by their performance anxiety.
entries.Failure: The creature is {@condition frightened|CRB|frightened 2}, and the dreadsong dancer is {@condition undetected} by the creature for 1 minute. The creature can't use {@action Seek} to find the dreadsong dancer.
entries.Critical Failure: As failure, but the creature can't reduce its {@condition frightened} condition below 2 for 1 minute. In addition, the dreadsong dancer is affected by its performance anxiety.

bot.name: Dreadsong

entries: The excorion moves about by way of hundreds of pulsating blood vessels, which stretch from its body in dozens of tight, ropy bundles and anchor it to the ground. An excorion cannot be.
mid.name: Vein Walker

entries: Shoved, or otherwise forcibly moved except by magic, and the excorion ignores difficult terrain (but not greater difficult terrain).
mid.name: Tripped,

entries: The excorion plants a magical handprint on the target, marking them as chosen for death. The excorion makes a fist {@action Strike} against an adjacent creature; this does not count toward the excorion's multiple attack penalty. On a hit, the attack does no damage, but the creature becomes {@condition observed} to every excorion within 60 feet, even if an excorion's line of sight would be blocked by a wall or other obstacle. This effect lasts until the handprint is washed off, which requires water and spending 3 actions to fully clean off.
bot.name: Bloody Handprint

entries: The excorion sacrifices itself and transfers its bloody, vital energy to a willing living creature within 30 feet. The excorion is immediately destroyed, and the targeted living creature heals a number of HP equal to half the excorion's remaining HP at the time that it used this ability. The living creature is {@condition slowed|CRB|slowed 1} during its next turn as its body adjusts to the newly transfused blood and vital energy; the living creature also counts as an excorion for 1 minute for the purpose of seeing other excorions' Bloody Handprint marks.
bot.name: Hit Points; Effect

entries: The excorion spews necrotic blood all over a foe it has {@condition grabbed}.
The {@condition grabbed} creature must succeed at a DC 25 Fortitude save or become {@condition sickened|CRB|sickened 2}.
bot.name: Vomit Blood

entries: +18, {@skill Thievery} +18 Str +1, Dex +6, Con +1, Int +0, Wis +2, Cha +4 Items +1 daggers (3), moderate darkvision elixir, jade bauble talisman (affixed to main-gauche), leather armor, +1 striking main-gauche, +1 striking rapier.
top.name: Stealth

mid.trigger: A creature targets Fayati with an attack and she can see the attacker
entries: Fayati dodges out of the way, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.
mid.name: Nimble Dodge

mid.trigger: A creature within Fayati's reach is hit by a melee {@action Strike} from one of her allies
entries: Fayati makes a {@action Strike} against the triggering creature.
mid.name: Opportune Backstab

bot.requirements: Fayati's last attack was a successful melee {@action Strike} with her rapier
entries: Fayati makes a main-gauche {@action Strike} against the same creature that she just hit. This {@action Strike} deals an additional {@damage 4d6} precision damage.
bot.name: Deepen the Wound

entries: Fayati critically succeeds at a {@action Strike} against a creature, until the start of her next turn, the first time that another member of the Copper Hand deals damage to that creature during their turn, they deal an additional {@damage 1d6} precision damage to it.
bot.name: Guildmaster's Lead Whenever

entries: Fayati deals {@dice 2d6} extra precision damage to {@condition flat-footed} creatures.
bot.name: Sneak Attack

entries: 30 feet, DC 25.
mid.name: Frightful Presence

entries: When Frefferth is destroyed, his body and items dissipate into shadowy nothingness and the knight re-forms after {@dice 1d4} days within the sarcophagus in area D12, fully healed. Frefferth can be trapped only by returning the chain of the stilled spirit to the sarcophagus (see areas D12 and D34), in which case Frefferth's body dissipates, leaving his items in the spot where he was last slain.
mid.name: Rejuvenation

entries: As dullahan.
bot.name: Head Hunter
bot.entries_as_xyz: Ability not found: 'Head Hunter As dullahan.' in Frefferth, p.35

entries: Whenever Frefferth damages a creature with a critical hit using a ranged piercing weapon, the weapon remains impaled in the victim's body. The victim becomes {@condition clumsy|CRB|clumsy 1} as long as they are impaled; the impaling weapon can be removed by the affected creature or an adjacent ally as a 2-action activity that has the {@trait manipulate} trait.
bot.name: Impaler

entries: As dullahan.
bot.name: Reap
bot.entries_as_xyz: Ability not found: 'Reap As dullahan.' in Frefferth, p.35

entries: As dullahan, except Frefferth summons a nightmare (Bestiary 244) instead.
(This is already factored into Frefferth's level and the difficulty of this encounter.)
bot.name: Summon Steed

entries: A giant bone skipper identifies bones and creatures with a skeletal system in the listed range.
top.name: Bonesense

entries: The giant bone skipper Leaps up to 20 feet. It then makes a mandibles {@action Strike}, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to its attack roll.
bot.name: Leaping Charge

entries: As bone skipper swarm, but DC 25.
bot.name: Marrow Rot

Marrow rot affects only creatures with a skeletal
system

entries: +7 Str +0, Dex +3, Con +1, Int +1, Wis +0, Cha +4 Items daggers (5), standard skeleton key, studded leather armor.

mid.trigger: A creature ends its movement adjacent to Kolo
entries: Kolo {@action Step||Steps}.
mid.name: Scurry

entries: Kolo's melee Strikes deal an extra {@damage 1d6} precision damage to Medium or larger creatures.
bot.name: Upward Stab

entries: +12 Str –1, Dex +4, Con +2, Int –1, Wis +3, Cha +2.
top.name: Survival

mid.trigger: Another creature in the najra lizard's square succeeds at a {@skill Deception} check to {@action Create a Diversion}
entries: The najra lizard automatically successfully Creates a Diversion against the same targets.
mid.name: Shared Diversion

entries: The creature is extremely thirsty and can't quench its thirst while poisoned; Saving Throw DC 21 Fortitude; Maximum Duration 4 hours; Stage 1 {@damage 1d4} poison damage, {@condition fatigued}, and {@dice 1d4} damage that can't be recovered until the creature quenches its thirst (1 round); Stage 2 as stage 1 (1 hour)
bot.name: Najra Lizard Venom

entries: The najra lizard's melee Strikes deal {@damage 1d6} precision damage to creatures sharing a square with more than one najra lizard.
bot.name: Najra Swarm Attack

entries: The ofalth zombie is permanently {@condition slowed|CRB|slowed 1} and can't use reactions.
top.name: Slow

entries: The ofalth zombie gains fast healing 2 as long as it is in the Catacombs or another area with a high concentration of dead.
mid.name: Corpse Wallow

entries: 10 feet, DC 24.
As zombie ability (Bestiary 340).
mid.name: Rotting Aura

entries: The ofalth zombie makes a fling offal {@action Strike} and compares the attack roll result to the AC of any foes within the area of a 15-foot cone emanating from the ofalth zombie. This counts as two attacks for the ofalth zombie's multiple attack penalty. The ofalth zombie can't use Bury in Offal again until it moves at least 10 feet to a different space.
bot.name: Bury in Offal

entries: As ofalth, but DC 22.
bot.name: Wretched Weeps

entries: #157 77), victor's medallion from the Challenge of Sky and Heaven.
top.name: Pathfinder Adventure Path

entries: Shristi makes two unarmed Strikes. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purposes of resistances and weaknesses. He applies his multiple attack penalty to.
bot.name: Flurry of Blows

entries: Strikes normally. As it has the {@trait flourish} trait, Shristi can use {@action Flurry of Blows} only once per turn.
bot.name: the

entries: With a loud shout, Shristi unleashes his ki as a crackling shroud of thunder and lightning that engulfs his body. Until the end of his next turn, Shristi's unarmed Strikes and Strikes with weapons that have the {@trait monk} trait deal an additional 3 electricity damage and 3 sonic damage.
bot.name: Heaven's Thunder

entries: Shristi enters a combat stance perfected by past champions of the Challenge of.
bot.name: Sky and Heaven Stance

entries: While in this stance, the only Strikes Shristi can make are skyward slash unarmed attacks.
These deal {@damage 1d10} slashing damage; are in the {@group brawling}; and have the nonlethal, unarmed, and versatile P traits.
bot.name: Sky and Heaven.

entries: Shristi gains resistance 2 to electricity and sonic damage.
bot.name: While in Sky and Heaven Stance,

entries: {@damage 1d6+5} piercing Melee war razor +17 (agile, backstabber, deadly d8, finesse), Damage {@damage 1d4+5} piercing Ranged {@as 1} dagger +17 (agile, finesse, thrown 10 feet, versatile S), Damage {@damage 1d4+5} piercing.
bot.name: S), Damage

entries: When attacking a {@condition flat-footed} creature, the Skinsaw murderer deals {@dice 1d6} additional precision damage.
bot.name: Sneak Attack

entries: As the ranger feat (Core Rulebook 171).
bot.name: Twin Takedown

mid.trigger: A creature hits the seamer with a melee {@action Strike}
entries: Every Skinsaw seamer keeps a sewing needle attached to a loop of thick silk, wrapped loosely around their hand not holding a weapon, which they can use in combat to snag or disarm attackers; ; The seamer attempts an {@skill Athletics} check to either {@action Grapple} or {@action Disarm} the triggering creature.
mid.name: Wire Catch

entries: {@damage 2d6+7} piercing Ranged dagger +20 (agile, finesse, thrown 10 feet, versatile S), Damage {@damage 1d4+7} piercing.
bot.name: S), Damage

bot.requirements: The Skinsaw seamer dealt damage with a melee weapon other than its war razor with their last action
entries: The seamer makes a war razor {@action Strike} against the same creature that they just damaged. On a hit, the seamer slices a strip of flesh from the target and deals {@damage 1d6} {@condition persistent damage ||persistent bleed damage} in addition to the war razor's usual damage.
bot.name: Flay

bot.requirements: The Skinsaw seamer is currently grappling a creature
entries: The seamer stitches a piece of cloth to the creature's arm, face, or leg, potentially hindering it. The creature must attempt a DC 26 Reflex saving throw; if the seamer has already successfully used their Flay ability against the creature within the past minute, the creature's save result is one degree of success worse. Critical Success The creature is unaffected. Success The creature takes {@damage 1d4} piercing damage. Failure The creature is {@condition clumsy|CRB|clumsy 1}, {@condition dazzled}, {@condition enfeebled|CRB|enfeebled 1}, or {@condition flat-footed} (seamer's choice). This effect lasts until the creature spends a single action to tear out the stitching, which deals {@damage 1d6} piercing damage to it. Critical Failure The creature is {@condition clumsy|CRB|clumsy 2}, {@condition blinded}, {@condition enfeebled|CRB|enfeebled 2}, or {@condition flat-footed} (seamer's choice). This effect lasts until the creature spends 2 actions to tear out the stitching, which deals {@damage 2d6} piercing damage to it.
bot.name: Quick Stitch

entries: The rotting hides and molding straw stuffing of skinstitches are ideal nesting grounds for vermin and insect swarms. Any animal swarm sharing a space with a skinstitch gains fast healing 3. Additionally, if a creature deals at least 10 piercing or slashing damage to the skinstitch, the swarm can use its swarming bites {@action Strike} (or similar attack) against the attacker as a reaction.
mid.name: Pest Haven

entries: The skinstitch makes a blade {@action Strike} against an animal or humanoid. On a success, the skinstitch slices a long strip of flesh from the target; if the skinstitch dealt damage, it deals an additional {@damage 1d6} {@condition persistent damage ||persistent bleed damage}.
bot.name: Flay

bot.requirements: The skinstitch hasn't used this ability since the last time it successfully used its Flay ability
entries: The skinstitch sews flayed flesh to its body to seal tears and rents. The skinstitch regains 8.
bot.name: Stitch Skin

entries: While the tenome is Grabbing a creature, all other creatures are {@condition concealed} to the tenome.
mid.name: Obscuring Grab

bot.requirements: The tenome has a creature {@condition grabbed} or {@condition restrained}
entries: The tenome makes a jaws {@action Strike} against the {@condition grabbed} or {@condition restrained} creature. If the {@action Strike} hits, the creature must succeed at a DC 18 Fortitude save or become {@condition drained|CRB|drained 1} (or the value of the creature's {@condition drained} condition increases by 1 if it already has a {@condition drained} value, to a maximum of {@condition drained|CRB|drained 4}). The tenome regains {@dice 1d8} Hit Points each time it uses Bone Drink.
bot.name: Bone Drink

entries: The tenome {@action Stride||Strides} twice, {@action Step||Steps} twice, or {@action Step||Steps} and {@action Stride||Strides} (in either order). It cannot use Burst of Speed again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.
bot.name: Burst of Speed

entries: {@as 2} (emotion, enchantment, fear, incapacitation, mental, occult, visual) A tenome can gaze at a creature within 30 feet by presenting one of its eyes. The target must succeed at a DC 21 Will save or become {@condition frightened|CRB|frightened 1}. If the tenome uses 2 actions and presents both of its eyes, the target is also {@condition paralyzed} if it fails the save. A creature that successfully saves is temporarily immune for 24 hours.
bot.name: Terrifying Gaze

entries: A teraphant can sense the emotions of creatures within 120 feet as an imprecise sense.
Emotion sense is a precise sense against creatures under an {@trait emotion} effect. A creature under the effects of calm emotions can't be noticed via emotion sense.
top.name: Emotion Sense

mid.trigger: A creature within 60 feet of the teraphant is targeted by a spell or ability with the {@trait emotion} trait
entries: The teraphant also benefits from the spell or effect, as though it were an additional target for 1 minute or until the triggering spell or ability ends.
mid.name: Empathetic Response

entries: A Medium or smaller creature hit by the teraphant's trunk is {@condition grabbed}. If the teraphant moves, it can bring the {@condition grabbed} creature along with it.
bot.name: Grabbing Trunk

bot.requirements: The teraphant has a creature {@condition grabbed}
entries: The teraphant slams the creature onto one of its horns. The target must attempt a DC 27 Reflex save or suffer {@damage 3d6+9} piercing damage and {@damage 1d6} {@condition persistent damage ||persistent bleed damage} ({@damage 6d6+18} piercing damage on a critical failure).
bot.name: Impale

entries: The teraphant lets out a loud trumpet that deals {@damage 8d8} mental damage (DC 27 basic Will save) in a 30-foot cone. A creature that fails its save is also pushed 15 feet (30 feet on a critical failure). If a pushed creatures strikes a solid barrier, it takes {@damage 3d6} bludgeoning damage and stops. The teraphant can't use.
bot.name: Psychokinetic Trumpet

entries: Trumpet again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.
bot.name: Psychokinetic

entries: Large or smaller, foot, DC 27.
bot.name: Trample

entries: A vaultbreaker ooze can sense nearby motion through vibration and air movement.
top.name: Motion Sense

entries: The vaultbreaker ooze's metallic plasm alerts it to the presence of metals with the {@trait precious} trait (including gold and platinum) within 30 feet.
top.name: Treasure Sense

mid.trigger: A creature Strikes the vaultbreaker ooze
entries: The ooze's outer plasm hardens into a protective shell of precious metals. Until the start of its next turn, it gains resistance 5 to physical damage (except adamantine), it has a –5-foot penalty to its Speed, and its pseudopod Strikes gain the versatile.
mid.name: Metallify

entries: P weapon trait.
mid.name: S or

entries: DC 23, {@damage 2d8+9} acid, {@action Escape} DC 23, Rupture 14 (19 when using Metallify)
bot.name: Engulf

entries: The vaultbreaker ooze instinctually shapes its pseudopod into a key, lockpick, or tool required to bypass a locking mechanism; it uses this pseudopod as thieves' tools to {@action Pick a Lock} or {@action Disable a Device}.
bot.name: Form Tool

entries: Skinsaw sanctum vault, modified spiked chains (2)
top.name: to the

entries: Any creature taking {@condition persistent damage ||persistent bleed damage} is {@condition flat-footed} against the Skinner's attacks. When attacking a {@condition flat-footed} creature, the Skinner deals an additional {@damage 2d6} precision damage.
bot.name: Bloody Sneak Attack

entries: Skinner can effectively wield abnormally long spiked chains and can do so using only one hand.
bot.name: Chain Expert The

bot.requirements: The Skinner has an adjacent creature {@condition grabbed} with her spiked chain
entries: The Skinner attempts an {@skill Athletics} check against the {@condition grabbed} creature's Reflex save.
bot.name: Chain Up

entries: On a success, the Skinner knots her chain around the {@condition grabbed} creature, which becomes {@condition restrained} ({@action Escape} DC = 10 + the result of the Skinner's {@skill Athletics} check); on a critical success, the creature also falls {@condition prone}. Regardless of whether the Skinner succeeds, she drops the chain.
bot.name: DC.

entries: Skinner makes a successful cleaver {@action Strike} against a {@condition grabbed} creature, she also deals {@damage 1d6} {@condition persistent damage ||persistent bleed damage} (or {@dice 2d6} on a critical hit).
bot.name: Flay Whenever the

bot.requirements: The Skinner has a creature {@condition grabbed} with her spiked chain
entries: The Skinner pulls the creature into the nearest open adjacent square and makes a cleaver {@action Strike} against the creature.
bot.name: Hook and Flay
